main.name: Chee
main.description: Currently working as a Software Development Engineer where I done everything by searching solution from Google and slaping my keyboard
main.bio: I am an enthusiastic and optimistic person who born in a small town in Malaysia. I have spend few years studied in Multimedia University and acquired a Bachelor Degree in IT and major in security technology. I am passionated with coding and security technology so i started my learning when i was 19. I currently working in SEMI Integration which developed different kind of automation system for various projects. I also love to play music and sport during my free time and i dreamed that i able to travel the world while taking my work with me

resume.skillmessage: I'm a enthusiastic person who like to spend time learning new tech ! Below are some of my skillset that i acquired during my work and my studies.

education.degree: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology (Hons.) (Security Technology)
education.description: After i finished my study on secondary school. I found out that i passionated about IT and I would like to see how IT can change the future. I choose to study IT and major in security technology as i am interested to know how the cybersecurity tech works in the world besides coding. I learned many programming languages such as python, java, c++, javascript, etc. Besides that, I also learned a lot of other type of knowledge such as encryption algorithm, data structure, cybersecurity, web development and etc.

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: After i quited my job from CSE, I joined SEMI Integration as a Software Development Engineer. As my clients are semi-conductor field, I have done various SECS/GEM compliance projects for automation. I also developed some prototype projects for my company so that it able to provide other services to the clients

work.title: IT Project Engineer
work.description: As i started my first job in cse-global, I learned to do PI System and LIMS System and implements to all my clients as per requested. I also provided various kind of tech support to help them solve their issues and also maintainance their server. Furthermore, I also done various minor development to provide the service neeeded for the projects

portfolio.projectmessage: Sometime i like to spend some time to study and learn new tech. Here are some of my side projects that i have done and you may review the repo in github.

projects.title: REACT RESUME
projects.description: A simple resume website developed using ReactJs

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
